game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden in a long-forgotten ruin deep in the jungle. Your quest is to navigate the treacherous terrain, solve the puzzles, and bring back the artifact.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a legendary weapon blueprint

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Talk to the local villagers and gather information about the location of the ruins.

task.objective: Solve the puzzle at the entrance
task.description: You'll find a riddle on a stone pedestal. Decipher it to open the ruins.
The artifact is said to be in the heart of the ruins. Be careful, as traps and ancient guardians await.
The final challenge lies in a chamber guarded by a statue. Retrieve the artifact and make your way back.
